name: com.walcht.unityd3
description: A solution for authoring visualizations in d3.js-like style in Unity.

samples.description: Contains a sample to be attached to a GameObject to render a basic 2D histogram
Contains a sample to be attached to a GameObject to render a basic 3D histogram
Contains a sample to be attached to a GameObject to render a basic 2D line chart
Contains a sample to be attached to a GameObject to render a basic 3D line chart
Contains a sample to be attached to a GameObject to render a basic 2D scatter plot
